title: the german chancellor angela merkel: a short biography
content: angela merkel is a german politician best known as the first female chancellor of germany and one of the architects of the european union. trained as a physicist, merkel entered politics after the 1989 fall of the berlin wall. rising to the position of chairwoman of the christian democratic union party, merkel became germany's first female chancellor following the 2005 national elections. merkel is a prominent figure within the european union and has helped turn germany into one of the world's leading nations.
